compilations.description: Whether you’re trying to be healthy, pulling an all-nighter, or just trying to get through the day, protein-packed snacks are your best friends. That’s because protein can give you an energy boost and help you stay fuller longer. From avocado deviled eggs to cacao chia pudding, these snacks are full of protein-packed ingredients like Greek yogurt and almond butter, which will ensure you don’t get hangry anytime soon.
compilations.name: Protein-Packed Snacks

compilations.description: Can't sleep? Want to snack? These delicious snacks are a quick and easy fix to all your after-midnight hunger pangs. Chomp down on some hummus and carrot sticks or devour a couple handfuls of delicious oven-roasted chickpeas. And once you're full and satisfied, sail softly back into dreamland!
compilations.name: Healthy Snacks For Late-night Cravings

compilations.description: Planning a trip to the beach to celebrate the coming of summer? These easy snacks will make sure you're fueled and ready for the next game of water polo. From parmesan garlic & herb pita chips to super easy to make banana roll-ups, these treats are beach-friendly and hassle free. So what are you waiting for? Pack up your picnic basket with these goodies: summer's here!
compilations.name: Easy Snacks To Pack For Your Next Beach Trip

compilations.description: Looking for low-carb options? We've got plenty for you! The crispy Chicken Piccata and the saucy Ratatouille Lasagna each pack tons of flavor without going overboard on carbs — and they pair well with just about anything. The hardest part? Choosing which dish to make first!
compilations.name: Low Carb Meals For A Healthy You

compilations.description: You can never go wrong with avocado, and these easy mouthwatering recipes can enjoyed at any time of the day. Start your day with a wholesome Raddish Avocado Toast or enjoy a Salmon Crab Seafood Stack on a lunch date with your special someone. But why settle for one when you have 31 options to try from? Avo-fun for the whole month!
compilations.name: 31 Days 31 Avocado Recipes
Make Healthy Snacks Tasty With These Recipes

compilations.description: We've all had those days when you just don't feel like working out. Regardless of whether or not you make it to the gym, these recipes will keep you feeling engaged, alert, and fueled up for whatever comes your way. From caprese avocado bowls to spinach pasta, these meals are nutritious, delicious, and nourishing.
compilations.name: Recipes For When You Don't Feel Like Working Out

compilations.description: With so many health benefits, you ought to use yogurt wisely and creatively! It is easy to digest, packed with vitamins, and a rich source of protein as well. Make the Honey Granola Yogurt Bark for your on-the-go meals. Paprika-Spiced Chicken With Lemon Yogurt And Crispy Potatoes is the perfect dinner recipe as it is delicious, easy and healthy, all at the same time!
compilations.name: Use Your Yogurt Wisely!

description: This chicken salad is a lunchtime delight! Packed with creamy avocado, tender chicken, and crunchy veggies, it's a healthy and satisfying meal that won't weigh you down. Tossed in a tangy yogurt dressing with a hint of spice, it's a flavor explosion that's perfect for a light meal.

instructions.display_text: In a blender or food processor, combine the yogurt, lime juice, pepper, and chili powder and pulse to combine. Add ½ of the avocado and blend until creamy.
In a medium bowl, combine the chicken, yogurt sauce, celery, the remaining ½ avocado, onion, and salt. Mix until well combined.
Serve on low-carb bread and garnish with cilantro, or as desired.
Enjoy!

keywords: avocado, chia pudding, chicken salad, chickpea chips, deviled eggs, easy, healthy, keto, protein, snacks, vegan, vegetarian
name: Low-Carb Avocado Chicken Salad

compilations.name: 5 Recipes You Should Know How To Make In Your 20's

compilations.description: We don’t know about you, but whenever it’s raining outside, the only thing we crave is indulgent comfort food. Whether you’re in the mood for a straight-forward grilled cheese, a steaming bowl of curry noodle soup ready in under 30 minutes, or a hands-off slow-cooker meal like this turkey chili with cornbread dumplings, these recipes will fill your body and soul with warmth on any cold rainy night.
compilations.name: Rainy Day Dishes

compilations.description: Do you agree that there's no such thing as too much cheese? We thought so! So here's a way to spend an entire week in cheese heaven. Nom on Grilled Cheese Sloppy Joe Cups, or make a midnight snack out of our Waffle Grilled Cheese. You can even pretend to be healthy with our Cauliflower Grilled Cheese. Cheese-pull away!
compilations.name: Grilled Cheese For Every Day Of The Week
Sandwiches For Every Day Of The Month

compilations.description: We’ve got the easiest and fastest meal plan for an entire week. Not sold yet? Each meal only needs 4 ingredients. Kickstart your Monday with our Avocado Peach and Feta Toast and round out your weekend with a classic comfort food: a Bean and Cheese Burrito. Cooking doesn't have to be hard or intimidating: in fact, it's a 4-step process of fun!
compilations.name: 4 Ingredient Recipes For An Entire Week
Recipes For When It's Raining Outside
Recipes For When You're Reading Your Favorite Book

compilations.description: Sometimes you just want to cook something easy and delicious that won’t leave a dent in your wallet. From a delicious and vegan-friendly Cauliflower Gnocchi to a classic Grilled Gheese, these budget-friendly recipes are our top picks for meals that don't cost a fortune. Come on, let’s get cooking!
compilations.name: Budget-Friendly Recipes 8 Ways!

description: The secret to a perfect grilled cheese recipe? Mayonnaise! (No, really, it makes the outside crispier and tangier.) Spread butter on one side of each bread slice and mayo on the other. Sandwich the cheddar slices between the buttered sides, leaving the mayo sides on the outside. Fry for a few minutes until golden, dip into a bowl of tomato soup, and resolve to never make a grilled cheese without mayo ever again!

instructions.display_text: On a cutting board, butter each piece of bread with butter on one side.
Flip the bread over and spread each piece of bread with mayonnaise.
Place the cheese on the buttered side of one piece of bread. Top it with the second piece of bread, mayonnaise side out.
Heat a nonstick pan over medium low heat.
Place the sandwich on the pan, mayonnaise side down.
Cook for 3-4 minutes, until golden brown.
Using a spatula, flip the sandwich over and continue cooking until golden brown, about 2-3 minutes.
Enjoy!

name: Grilled Cheese

compilations.description: Who doesn't like a quick and easy breakfast that will instantly fill you up? From some versatile banana pancakes to cheesy egg toast, these recipes will keep you satisfied for rest of the day. Open up our treasure trove of recipes and never step out of the house hungry again.
compilations.name: Super Quick Breakfasts That Every Millennial Should Know

compilations.description: We’ve got the easiest and fastest meal plan for an entire week. Not sold yet? Each meal only needs 4 ingredients. Kickstart your Monday with our Avocado Peach and Feta Toast and round out your weekend with a classic comfort food: a Bean and Cheese Burrito. Cooking doesn't have to be hard or intimidating: in fact, it's a 4-step process of fun!
compilations.name: 4 Ingredient Recipes For An Entire Week

compilations.description: We love bread — who doesn't? Toasts are our true loves, but we've gotta keep it interesting. Luckily, we've curated seven days worth of toasts to satisfy the toast-lover in you. Our sheet pan shakshuka toast simplifies a flavorful classic while our flavorful, Nutella-marshmallow toast gives you the sugar jolt you need to get your day going. Out of bread? The Bacon and Eggs Sweet Potato Toast is here to come to the rescue. Here's a toast to better mornings!
compilations.name: 7 Days 7 Toast Recipes

compilations.description: Breakfast is the most important meal of the day and well, what better way to start off your morning than with a treat? Test out our fruity and refreshing or some to get the true taste of a delicious and fulfilling breakfast! We love these all so much, it's hard to pick a favorite.
compilations.name: Breakfast You Cannot Get Enough Of!

compilations.description: You know those people who can't cook but love to eat? Are you one of those people? Well then, we're here to save your day with these easy recipes that are anything but boring. Test out our scrumptious Sweet Potato Chips.Then, follow them up with a fun and flavorful plate of Spaghetti with Garlic & Oil. Try out these foolproof recipes and tell all your friends – get ready to impress them with your surprise cooking skills! Believe me, they're going to be floored.
compilations.name: Easy Recipes Anyone Can Make!

compilations.description: Breakfast is the most important meal of the day – it's also the most-missed, with coffee often taking its place. We're about to change that – no, not just with cereal. With our super fluffy omelet, our date-worthy Creme Brulee French Toast, or a family brunch favorite: our Breakfast Tater Tot Poutine. Move over, Frosted Flakes, there are some new breakfast MVPs in town!
compilations.name: Tasty's Top 25 Breakfasts

compilations.description: Looking for fun ways to spend time with your kids? Why not cook with them! These recipes are super easy and perfect for your little chefs. Start your day with the cheesy egg toast and then walk your way up to a tangy and sweet orange chicken for dinner! Let's get cookin'!
compilations.name: Kid Friendly Recipes
Quick Weekday Breakfasts For When You Hit The Snooze Button

description: Upgrade your breakfast game with this mouthwatering Cheesy Egg Toast! It's the perfect combination of gooey cheese and fluffy eggs, all nestled on a crispy slice of toast. Say goodbye to boring breakfasts and hello to this scrumptious morning delight!

instructions.display_text: Preheat the oven or a toaster oven to 400°F (200°C).
With a spoon, press down on the center of the bread to form a pocket. Spread the butter around the edges of the bread, then crack the egg into the pocket.
Sprinkle the cheese around the egg, then season with salt and pepper.
Bake the toast for 10–15 minutes, depending on how runny you like the yolk.
Serve immediately.
Enjoy!

name: Cheesy Egg Toast Perfect For Breakfast

compilations.description: Work lunches can be tricky if you’re vegan and trying to find cheap and delicious options that’ll pack and travel well. But all of these recipes fit the bill! You can prep any of these four super quick and easy vegan lunches in batches and ahead of time so they’re ready to grab in the morning before you head to work. From one-pot Mexican quinoa bowls to to chickpea salad sandwiches, take your pick and get cooking.
compilations.name: Easy To Pack Vegan Lunches

compilations.description: Too often, sandwiches are just afterthought and don’t get the love they deserve. But c’mon, we’re talking about bread vessels for any food you can dream of! They’re a lunch treasure and should be treated as such. These five recipes were built to give sandwiches the respect they’re due. From buttermilk-fried chicken sandwiches to chickpea salad sandwiches, these really might be the best thing since sliced bread.
compilations.name: Sandwiches You'll Love Packing For Lunch
Five Packable Work Lunches Loaded With Protein

compilations.description: There is nothing more classic, quintessential yet, or versatile than a sandwich. So we decided to give you 69 of them. The Chicken Bacon Ranch Sandwich Roll is perfect for a summer picnic. The Cuban from Miami never disappoints. For something out-of-the-box, we recommend our loaded Thanksgiving Dip Sandwich (we promise it tastes good all year around). And if you're on the vegan train, go for our tempeh bacon sandwich. Go get that bread already!
compilations.name: 69 Sandwiches From Tasty

compilations.description: Whether you are newly vegan, a seasoned veteran, or just trying out some meatless recipes, you need to try these meals. A refreshing cucumber, tomato, and avocado salad is a quick and easy lunch to bring to school or work. For cooler evenings, we love this eggplant, potato, and tomato stew or our veggie-packed, one-pot split pea soup. These plant-based meals are anything but boring.
compilations.name: Vegan Meals To Get You Through The Day

compilations.description: All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy so here’s a list of all the tasty things for Jack’s kitchen! We ensure you get all your nutrition between those hectic work meetings. These quick recipes make sure that you reach your workstation from your kitchen, all under 20 minutes!
compilations.name: 20-Minute-Or-Less Lunches For When You Have Back-To-Back Meetings

compilations.description: Take a break from boring sandwiches and get a little adventurous with these five enticing stacks! Try the meaty Hasselback Cheesesteak Sandwiches or a Vegan Pulled Pork Sandwich. Fall in loaf, one sandwich at a time!
compilations.name: You Will Loaf These Sandwiches!

compilations.description: Eating these healthy legumes need not be bland or boring. We've got the right way to have your chickpeas! The Chickpea Salad Sandwich makes for a great lunch, or snack on Spicy Roasted Chickpeas! Chickpea Curry is the absolute flavorbomb for sure! Hearty or crispy, chickpeas can do it all!
compilations.name: 5 Must-Try Chickpea Recipes

compilations.description: All hail the vegan variety hour! Here's a highlight reel of delicious recipes that happen to be vegan. From a quick Chickpea Salad Sandwich to a hearty Eggplant Potato Tomato Stew, Tasty is bringing deliciously amazing recipes to all our vegan fans.
compilations.name: Vegan Variety Hour

description: Say hello to your new lunchtime favorite: the Chickpea Salad Sandwich! This scrumptious, protein-packed delight is a fresh twist on the classic sandwich, perfect for a quick and satisfying meal.

instructions.display_text: Add the chickpeas to a medium bowl and mash with potato masher until a chunky texture is reached.
Add the red onion, red bell pepper, vegan mayo, Dijon mustard, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, black pepper, and dill, and stir until well combined.
Store the chickpea salad in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 5 days.
To serve, spread the chickpea salad onto bread and top with leafy greens of choice. Wrap in parchment paper and secure with rubber band.
Enjoy!

name: Chickpea Salad Sandwich

description: This chicken fajita quesadilla is the ultimate mashup of two classic dishes! With tender chicken, colorful peppers and onions, and plenty of cheese, it's a delicious and satisfying meal. Serve it with some salsa and sour cream for an extra kick.

instructions.display_text: In a large skillet, coat chicken with salt, pepper, chili powder, cumin, cayenne, and garlic powder. Cook 5-7 minutes.
Add the peppers and onions and cook for 5-7 minutes, or until they are soft. Remove chicken, onions and peppers from the pan and set aside.
Place the tortilla in the skillet and add a layer of cheese on half of the tortilla.
Add cooked chicken, peppers and onions. Top with more cheese and fold the tortilla in half.
Cook for 6 minutes over medium heat, flipping half way.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with pico de gallo, guacamole, and sour cream on the side.
Enjoy!

keywords: bbq, cheese, cheesesteak, chicken, fajita, mushroom, quesadilla, spinach, steak
name: Chicken Fajita Quesadilla

components.raw_text: ½ pound chicken breast, cut into thin strips

components.extra_comment: green, red, or yellow peppers, julienned
components.raw_text: ½ cup green/red/yellow bell pepper, julienned
1 cup cheddar cheese, shredded (double for 2 quesadillas)
1 cup monterey jack cheese, shredded (double for 2 quesadillas)

compilations.name: Make-Ahead Breakfast Ideas for the Week
Recipes To Make With Your New College Roomie

compilations.description: Let your taste buds travel around the world with a new breakfast from a different country for each day of the week. Start off with a Vietnamese Banh Mi Meatball Sandwich and work your way to our hot Canadian pancake breakfast. Enjoy the taste of every culture right from your kitchen!
compilations.name: Breakfast Around The World

compilations.description: From classic chicken-layered quesadillas to a juicy steak fajita quesadilla, these versatile quesadilla recipes are equally impressive, delicious, and easier to make than you think. Share them with your friends and family — or keep them to yourself entirely! They’re so good that we wouldn’t blame you.
compilations.name: Cheesy Quesadilla Recipes

compilations.description: It can be hard to find good food on a budget. But don't worry, we can help with that. We're bringing a whole set of ideas to your table: ten recipes under $10, just for you. For a sweet start to your morning, try out our Blueberry Banana Pancakes, then whip up a batch of our super-filling Chicken & Veggie Stir Fry for a hearty weeknight meal. The best part? Your wallet's doing a happy dance.
compilations.name: 10 Recipes Under $10

description: This tasty and convenient breakfast option that can be made ahead of time, this quesadilla is the perfect grab-and-go meal for busy mornings.

instructions.display_text: In a skillet thoroughly cook the sausage and eggs.
Place mixture in the center of a flour tortilla. Top with cheese, and fold the edges inward to form a sealed pocket.
Heat on a skillet, seam-side down. Flip and cook until golden brown.
You can freeze up to a month.
Enjoy!

keywords: breakfast, cheese, easy, eggs, healthy, meal prep, muffins, quesadilla, yogurt
name: Make-Ahead Breakfast Quesadilla

compilations.name: Five Hearty Breakfasts You Can Meal Prep On Sunday
Breakfast Meal Prep For People On The Go
Sandwiches For Every Day Of The Month
7 Make-Ahead Meals That Will Save Your Time

compilations.description: We all might be fancy inside, but throw those sweats on and there's no effort left at the long week to indulge. But hey, with Mr. Microwave and our handy recipes, you too, can be fancy. If you're in the mood for a dessert, test out the 5-Minute Microwave Cheesecake. For a savory touch, try the best-in-town Microwave Meal Prep Lasagna. Microwaves at the ready! Your stomach is calling you.
compilations.name: Microwaveable Dishes To Save You Time

compilations.description: Breakfast is the most important meal of the day – it's also the most-missed, with coffee often taking its place. We're about to change that – no, not just with cereal. With our super fluffy omelet, our date-worthy Creme Brulee French Toast, or a family brunch favorite: our Breakfast Tater Tot Poutine. Move over, Frosted Flakes, there are some new breakfast MVPs in town!
compilations.name: Tasty's Top 25 Breakfasts

compilations.description: There is nothing more classic, quintessential yet, or versatile than a sandwich. So we decided to give you 69 of them. The Chicken Bacon Ranch Sandwich Roll is perfect for a summer picnic. The Cuban from Miami never disappoints. For something out-of-the-box, we recommend our loaded Thanksgiving Dip Sandwich (we promise it tastes good all year around). And if you're on the vegan train, go for our tempeh bacon sandwich. Go get that bread already!
compilations.name: 69 Sandwiches From Tasty

compilations.description: If you're always busy in the mornings, we've got the perfect solution for you-:30-minute (or less) breakfasts. Kick off your week with a power-packed, microwave-friendly Breakfast Sandwich and round it out with a Berry Bowl that's as delicious as it is healthy. No matter what your breakfast vibe is, we've got you covered.
compilations.name: Quick Breakfast Recipes For Each Day Of The Week

compilations.description: Mornings are difficult enough without having to prepare lunch for the office. Here are a few quick, easy, and healthy lunch ideas for people who are always on the go. The Weekday Meal-Prep Chicken Burrito Bowls will save you time throughout the week! Make mornings ridiculously simple and nutritious with Microwave Prep Breakfast Sandwiches with ham or bacon.
compilations.name: Easy Office Lunch Ideas!

description: These breakfast sandwiches are easy to make and can be prepped and reheated in the microwave, making them a quick and convenient breakfast option for small kitchens, college students, or those on the go. Filled with eggs, bacon, and cheese, they're a delicious way to start the day.

instructions.display_text: On a large plate, arrange the sausage and the ham in a circle, then place a microwaveable mug in the center.
Crack the eggs into the mug, season with salt, pepper, and add a splash of milk. Stir until evenly mixed.
Microwave the entire plate for about 2 minutes until the egg is cooked through, making sure it does not bubble over.
Remove the plate and microwave the bacon strips on a separate plate for about 4-7 minutes. Check the bacon at 4 minutes, then every minute or so to make sure it doesn’t burn.
Drain the bacon of its fat, then set aside.
Invert the mug with the egg, then slice the egg cylinder into 5 equal rounds. You may have to run a knife around the mug first to ensure that the egg comes loose in one solid piece.
To assemble, layer your sandwich as you’d like with the meat, egg, cheese, and spinach.
Wrap each sandwich in a damp paper towel, then with parchment paper. Place the sandwiches in a large zip top bag, then freeze for up until 1 month.
When ready to eat, remove a sandwich from the freezer, unwrap the parchment, and microwave for about 2 minutes. Cool for 1 minute, then unwrap the paper towel.
Enjoy!

name: Microwave Prep Breakfast Sandwiches

components.raw_text: 2-3 strips bacon, sliced in half width-wise

compilations.description: You probably don't have enough time in the mornings to make and have a full breakfast. Try these easy to make recipes which you can eat on the way to class! Grab yourself asmoothie smoothie or a french toast roll up, something will surely fill you up! Any of them would be the quickest (and tastiest!) way to take your next breakfast to another level.
compilations.name: On-The-Go Breakfasts When You're Running Late for Class

compilations.description: Looking for a fresh start in 2021? We've got just the perfect recommendation to kickstart the new year! From french toasts, pancakes, cobblers, smoothies, avocado toasts, waffles and even this epic mini donut cereal bowl, here's an assortment of our top breakfast recipes. Cheers to a Tasty New Year!
compilations.name: Top Breakfasts of 2020!
Go Bananas With These Mouth-Watering Recipes

compilations.description: Are you bananas for bananas? Well, you should be! They're delicious, versatile, and they're good for you. We're here to celebrate bananas in all their forms: If you're in the mood for something sweet, try some State Fair-worthy Banana Fritters! If that doesn't quite cut it for you, try out our Strawberry Banana Pancake Skewers. Are you ready to go bananas?
compilations.name: Everything You Can Cook With Bananas

compilations.description: Bananas are one of our favorite snack foods, and for good reason. It's easy to take this humble fruit to the next level with some of our favorite banana recipes. This dark chocolate peanut butter smoothie combines some delicious flavors and makes for a great on-the-go breakfast. Or go wild for this rich and creamy banana pudding or our banana cream sandwiches.
compilations.name: Everything You Can Make With Bananas

description: Go bananas for this scrumptious Banana Peanut Butter French Toast Roll-Up! It's a fun twist on a classic breakfast dish, perfect for a weekend brunch or a special treat.

instructions.display_text: Roll each slice of bread flat with a rolling pin. Carefully cut off the crusts.
Spread desired amount of peanut butter and bananas along the edge of the bread, and roll up.
In a bowl, combine eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla.
Dip each roll-up in egg mixture, and pan-fry in a buttered skillet until all sides are golden brown.
Enjoy!

name: Banana Peanut Butter French Toast Roll-up

compilations.name: These Foods Can Relieve Period Symptoms

compilations.description: You promised yourself that you'll take care of your health — and we've got you covered! Start your morning with a refreshing Banana Berry Smoothie Bowl, or chow down on some Vegetarian Breakfast Apple Sausages. You can also indulge with some Vegan French Toast. We can't think of a better way to start the day.
compilations.name: Healthy Breakfast Recipes For 2021

compilations.description: Not feeling your best? We've got your back. Boost your health (and your spirit) with these healthy sandwiches that'll add some much-needed 'va-va-va-voom' to your day! Start your day with our Healthy Breakfast Sandwich and enjoy a flavorful and savory Finger Sandwich with your evening tea. Take your pick and let’s get started!
compilations.name: Healthy Sandwiches

compilations.description: There is nothing more classic, quintessential yet, or versatile than a sandwich. So we decided to give you 69 of them. The Chicken Bacon Ranch Sandwich Roll is perfect for a summer picnic. The Cuban from Miami never disappoints. For something out-of-the-box, we recommend our loaded Thanksgiving Dip Sandwich (we promise it tastes good all year around). And if you're on the vegan train, go for our tempeh bacon sandwich. Go get that bread already!
compilations.name: 69 Sandwiches From Tasty
Quick Weekday Breakfasts For When You Hit The Snooze Button

description: This healthy breakfast sandwich is a great way to start your day, with a toasted English muffin, avocado, turkey bacon, and a fried egg.

instructions.display_text: In a medium bowl, whisk together the egg, spinach, red bell pepper, black pepper, and salt.

Heat a nonstick pan over medium heat. Place a greased mason jar lid right-side up in the pan. Slowly pour the egg mixture into the lid. Cover the pan and cook for 3 minutes, until the egg has set on the bottom.
Remove the cover and use a fork pull the lid off of the egg. Flip the egg and cook for another 3 minutes, until cooked through.
Place the egg patty on the English muffin and top with the sliced avocado.
Enjoy!

name: Healthy Breakfast Sandwich

compilations.description: Whether you're in the mood for an avocado toast with a sunny-side-up egg on top or a fruit parfait, these easy breakfast recipes will help you start the day with a healthy and delicious treat that'll keep you full until lunch. And you won't need more than ten minutes to make them, which means more time in bed to get some much-needed extra sleep. Who can say no to that?
compilations.name: 4 Breakfasts Under 10 Minutes
Easy Three-Course Breakfast For New Year's Morning

compilations.description: If you're always busy in the mornings, we've got the perfect solution for you-:30-minute (or less) breakfasts. Kick off your week with a power-packed, microwave-friendly Breakfast Sandwich and round it out with a Berry Bowl that's as delicious as it is healthy. No matter what your breakfast vibe is, we've got you covered.
compilations.name: Quick Breakfast Recipes For Each Day Of The Week

compilations.description: When you’re done dancing your heart out and come back to your comfy abode, snack on some soothing recipes that will nourish your body for the next day, energize your mind for all your tasks, and revitalize your mood to take on the world. We are talking about some healthy Avocado Quinoa Power Salad, Soothing Lemon Ginger Tea, or a quick Egg, Avocado, & Tomato Toast. Lighten up your morning after a hard night of partying!
compilations.name: Soothing After-Party Recipes

description: The Egg Avocado Tomato Toast is a delicious and healthy breakfast option that is perfect for a busy morning.

instructions.display_text: Sliced two cherry tomatoes.
Mash ½ of 1 avocado with salt. (Use the other half for another toast.)
Prepare bread in a toaster to desired crispiness.
In a pan, fry an egg sunny side up.
Assemble the toast by spreading avocado on the toast, then the tomatoes and topping everything with the egg.
Enjoy!

keywords: , avocado, bell peppers, breakfast, busy, easy, eggs, fast, fruits, healthy, mom, morning, oatmeal, options, parfait, prep, protein, quick, routine, toast, upgraded, veggies
name: Egg, Avocado, & Tomato Toast

compilations.description: Hungry during the middle of the day and need a quick lunch fix? These are the perfect recipes for you! A really easy to make pizza toastie or just a bag ofnacho chips ! These are really easy recipes that will give you enough energy to tackle the rest of the day! The only hard thing will be choosing which recipe to make first!

Recipes For When You're Missing Your Childhood

compilations.description: Looking for fun ways to spend time with your kids? Why not cook with them! These recipes are super easy and perfect for your little chefs. Start your day with the cheesy egg toast and then walk your way up to a tangy and sweet orange chicken for dinner! Let's get cookin'!

No more of that plain Jane stuff. Here are some fun pizza recipes that are total game-changers, one for every night of the month! You’ve gotta try our super cheesy Pizza Bombs, our Meatball-Stuffed Crust Pizza Star, or of course, if you’re craving pizza for breakfast (because honestly, same), our Breakfast Pizza Boats!
compilations.name: 30 Fun Pizza Recipes For The Entire Month!

description: For a lazy night in, try this quick and delicious pizza toastie stuffed with cheese and pepperoni.

instructions.display_text: Top one piece of bread with marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, and pepperoni.
Cover with a second piece of bread and butter both slices of bread from edge to edge.
Place in preheated toastie machine and cook until bread is golden brown. (If the toastie is not browning evenly, flip half way through).
Remove from toastie and slice in half.
Enjoy!

name: Pizza Toastie

compilations.description: Looking for a fresh start in 2021? We've got just the perfect recommendation to kickstart the new year! From french toasts, pancakes, cobblers, smoothies, avocado toasts, waffles and even this epic mini donut cereal bowl, here's an assortment of our top breakfast recipes. Cheers to a Tasty New Year!
compilations.name: Top Breakfasts of 2020!

description: Experience the ultimate breakfast mashup with these Cinnamon Roll French Toast Roll-Ups! They're a delightful twist on classic cinnamon rolls and French toast, perfect for a cozy weekend morning.

instructions.display_text: Roll each slice of bread flat with a rolling pin. Carefully cut off crusts
In a bowl, combine melted butter, brown sugar, and 2 tablespoons cinnamon. Spread onto each bread slice, and roll up.
In a bowl, combine eggs, milk, ½ teaspoon cinnamon, and vanilla.
Dip each roll-up in egg mixture, and pan fry in a buttered skillet until all sides are golden brown.
Enjoy!

name: Cinnamon Roll French Toast Roll-up

compilations.description: If you’re watching your carb intake, breakfast can be a tricky meal. Thankfully, we have easy and delicious low-carb breakfast ideas for you! You can prep some ahead, like these sausage and egg cups, for a grab-and-go option. But if you have 20 extra minutes in the morning and want to treat yourself, try these baked avocado eggs. They’re super easy and you can have fun with the toppings and try whatever you have on hand in your kitchen.
compilations.name: 5 Low-Carb Breakfasts
12 Amazing Ways To Cook Your Eggs

compilations.description: Looking for a fresh start in 2021? We've got just the perfect recommendation to kickstart the new year! From french toasts, pancakes, cobblers, smoothies, avocado toasts, waffles and even this epic mini donut cereal bowl, here's an assortment of our top breakfast recipes. Cheers to a Tasty New Year!
compilations.name: Top Breakfasts of 2020!

description: Spice up your breakfast game with this hearty burrito filled with fluffy scrambled eggs, ham, cheddar cheese, and wrapped in a warm tortilla.

instructions.display_text: In a medium size bowl, whisk the eggs, salt, and Parmesan until well combined.

In a medium size saucepan over medium-high heat, melt the butter and pour the egg mixture into the pan. Let the egg cook just until it starts to set, then add the ham, scallions, and cheddar cheese in the center of the egg wrap.
Cover with a lid and cook for another 3 minutes, or until the egg is fully cooked through and the cheese is melted.
Remove from the pan and fold in the egg wrap’s left and right sides, then roll from the bottom to the top to form a burrito.
Enjoy!

name: Ham & Cheddar Wrapped Breakfast Burrito

compilations.name: Meatless Recipes That Carnivores Will Love

compilations.description: From classic chicken-layered quesadillas to a juicy steak fajita quesadilla, these versatile quesadilla recipes are equally impressive, delicious, and easier to make than you think. Share them with your friends and family — or keep them to yourself entirely! They’re so good that we wouldn’t blame you.
compilations.name: Cheesy Quesadilla Recipes

compilations.description: Call us Popeye because we absolutely love these spinach recipes! We bet you won't be able to resist testing out a few for yourself. In the mood for pie? Try out our delicious Greek Spinach Pies, which are our take on the classic spanakopita. Or you can kick it up a notch and cook yourself a scrumptious Spinach and Cheese Pork Roll: nothing spells comfort more. Whichever way we can get you to eat (and love) those greens works for us!
compilations.name: Spinach Recipes That Don't Suck

compilations.description: We're always looking for easy ways to squeeze in some greens into our diet and, well, anything tastes better when draped with cheese! Here, we're taking Popeye's favorite and giving you our creamy, cheesy, delicious best. For a savory party favorite, test out our Cheesy Spinach Artichoke Bread Ring. Or, whip up a quick weeknight meal with our Cheese, Spinach and Bacon Pasta that pairs classic comfort with a bit of crunch. Time to pick your favorites!
compilations.name: Spinach ALWAYS Tastes Better With Cheese

compilations.description: Tortillas are the perfect antidote to a gloomy day, so, we decided to amp them up & bring in some of our best-in-town tortilla recipes! Test out our Mini Pizza Bites and if you need something built for a bit more of a hearty appetite, try our mouthwatering Crunchy Taco Ring. Once you're done, don't forget to pick your favorites!
compilations.name: 8 Unique Ways To Use Tortillas

compilations.description: Spinach is hands down one of the most versatile, healthy & tasty vegetables. Don't believe us? Try for yourself! Creamy Spinach-Stuffed Mushrooms would make for a great appetizer at your next dinner. Want to have a cheesy snack, guilt-free? Whip up some oozy Spinach Dip Mozzarella Sticks. Add this leafy green's recipes to your list and feel like Popeye!
compilations.name: Healthy Spinach Recipes

compilations.description: All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy so here’s a list of all the tasty things for Jack’s kitchen! We ensure you get all your nutrition between those hectic work meetings. These quick recipes make sure that you reach your workstation from your kitchen, all under 20 minutes!
compilations.name: 20-Minute-Or-Less Lunches For When You Have Back-To-Back Meetings

compilations.description: When you have mushroom on hand, you're always just minutes away from a great meal. For a delicious weeknight recipe, whip up some garlic parmesan stuffed mushroom paired with a one-pot chicken mushroom pasta. Or, simply whip up some comforting cream of mushroom soup! Or get a taste of Japan with this Japanese arancini. The options are endless!
compilations.name: Mushrooms 18 Ways
Spinach Meals Because The Bag In Your Fridge Is Going Bad

compilations.description: Clean out your cheese drawer with these specially curated cheese recipes. From comfort foods to fine dining dishes, we’ve got it all! Start out your meal with these perfect appetizer: 3-Cheese Garlic Bread Take it further with delicious Stuffed Chicken Parmesan and on a sweet note with the Cream Cheese-Filled Banana Bread Muffins. Gear up for the ultimate cheese marathon.
compilations.name: Just Take It Cheesy!

description: This spinach and mushroom quesadilla is loaded with savory flavors and packed with nutritious veggies. The tender spinach and meaty mushrooms are complemented by melty cheese and a crispy tortilla, making it a delicious and satisfying meal or snack.

instructions.display_text: Let the oil heat up in the skillet and add the garlic followed by the mushrooms. Cook until the mushrooms have softened and caramelized a bit.
Add the spinach and cook until spinach has wilted.
Crack in the eggs and scramble with the veggies. Season with salt and pepper, and stir until fully cooked. Remove from the pan and set aside.
Place the tortilla in the skillet and add a layer of both cheeses on half of the tortilla.
Add the scramble, top with more cheese and fold the tortilla in half.
Cook for 6 minutes over medium heat, flipping half way.
Serve with salsa and garnish with fresh parsley.
Enjoy!

keywords: bbq, cheese, cheesesteak, chicken, fajita, mushroom, quesadilla, spinach, steak
name: Spinach & Mushroom Quesadilla

components.raw_text: ½ cup parmesan, shredded (double for 2 quesadillas)

compilations.name: Cheat Meals To Have Before Your New Years Resolution Begins
Recreate A Whole McDonald's Meal At Home

compilations.description: Bored of eating the same old burgers? To excite your taste buds, we've compiled the perfect list of burger from all around the world. Travel to Mexico with the Chorizo burger and recreate the magic of Japan with the Shrimp Tempura burger. For us, the middle-eastern feta-stuffed falafel burgers was a definite winner!
compilations.name: Burgers From Around The World

compilations.description: There's no better feeling than sitting down to a juicy, indulgent burger with ALL the fixins.' And we all know the best burgers are messy masterpieces. Luckily, we've got a week's worth of juicy burger delights that'll keep you on your burger toes! From our mouthwatering mac 'n cheese burgers to a heart healthy salmon burger, full of zest, there's something here for every burger lover. Go right ahead: it's never a bad time to get your burger on!
compilations.name: Juicy Burgers For each Day of The Week

compilations.description: Did somebody say homemade burgers? They're a crowd favorite for good reason. Test out the yummy or the all-time-fave today. We bet you won't be able to pick your favourite, 'cause we've got buns for dayyyys!!
compilations.name: Homemade Burgers That Will Make You Forget About Takeout

compilations.description: Everyone loves fast food but sometimes, whether you're trying to be a little friendly to your body or your wallet, it's better to just recreate those favorite moments at home. Luckily, that's where we come in! Kick off your fast food extravaganza with these super spicy Curly Fries that'll put Arby's munchies to shame, and follow them up with this massive Homemade Burger that'll fill your soul and your stomach. Pick your favorites and tell us: which recipes are you chowing down on this weekend?
compilations.name: Recipes For When You Are Craving Fast Food

compilations.description: Everyone loves burgers (seriously), but we've figured out what the perfect burger is for your 20s, 30s and 40s! A cheese-stuffed burger bomb sounds about perfect for someone figuring out their 20s, a bacon ranch burger bowl for when you've figured it out a little, and finally a Japanese-style fried chicken burger when you just want to eat what you want! See? The burger never goes out of style - we know it, now you will too. You can thank us later.
compilations.name: Burgers To Make In Your 20s, 30s, 40s

compilations.description: There's never a bad time to meet The King! Well, the Burger King, that is. But you're trying to save money and we're here to help, so we're going to teach you how to make your favorite Burger King recipes at home! Start with the all-time favorite Big Massive Burger or enjoy a Spicy Veggie Masala Burger with your friends. After all, who doesn't love burgers?
compilations.name: Make Burger King Recipes At Home

compilations.description: There's only one requirement for a party in our book: burgers. We've got a bunch to change up your hosting game and wow your guests! To start it off, we suggest you plate up our Mac N Cheese Waffle Burgers and if that's not enough, test out our Cheese Stuffed Mushroom Burger. We bet you'll be left wanting more. Fire up your grills, the burgers await you!
compilations.name: These 7 Burgers Are A Total Game Changer

compilations.description: Ground beef is cheap, easy, nutritious, and straight-up delicious. If you love it like we do, try our mozzarella-packed meatball bake. Or these beef and cheese empanadas are perfect for on-the-go snacking. You can also serve a ground beef stuffed scalloped potato roll to impress the guests at your next party! See, the options go on and on.
compilations.name: Everything You Can Make From Ground Beef

compilations.description: To all the burger lovers out there, look no further! We have the most juicy and indulgent burger recipes you can share with your burger buddy! If you prefer keeping things simple, then check out our classic Homemade Massive Burger. And if you think you can take up a good challenge, then this Mac N Cheese Bun Burger will BLOW YOUR MIND. Say YES to this Burgermania to which even Inspector Clouseau was not immune!
compilations.name: Recipes To Share With Your Burger Buddy

compilations.description: Want to experience the exotic flavors from around the world but are too busy to travel? Here's the solution, why not bring your destination to your kitchen! Time to travel to The World's Culinary Melting Pot. These quick and delicious fast food recipes are greater than the sum of their parts and offer something unique. From the Big Massive Burger to the classic New York City Hot Dog, here are a few that fit the all-encompassing “American Dream”.
compilations.name: Bring American Fast Food To Your Kitchen

compilations.description: You're invited to a How I Met Your Mother watch party! These recipes will be the perfect fit, just like Barney's suits! Try Marshall’s pick for the best burger in New York, the Homemade Big Massive Burger, or make your own "accidental" Curly Fries. When life gives you a pineapple, don’t ask where it came from–just make
compilations.name: Host a How I Met Your Mother Watch Party!

compilations.description: When we think of fast food, our mouths begin to salivate and our stomachs get ready to enjoy a delicious and ever-filling meal. Fast food is something we all love, that sometimes it's just not possible to go out and buy, for whatever the reason may be. Well, have no fear; we are here. We have hand-picked our favorite fast food recipes just for you! From our famous Honey BBQ Chicken Wings to golden and crispy Air Fryer Fish & Chips , we have it all! So what are you waiting for? Dig in!
compilations.name: Fast Food You Can Make at Home!

description: This homemade big massive burger recipe is perfect for anyone looking to indulge in a delicious and satisfying meal. With juicy beef, melted cheese, and all the fixings, this burger is sure to hit the spot.

instructions.display_text: Roll half of the beef mince into a ball and pat it down until a finger thick, bigger than palm size patty. Repeat with remaining beef.
Fry both patties with salt and pepper for 2 and a half minutes a side. Add 1 cheese single to one of the patties.
Toast the burger buns on a dry pan on medium heat until one of the sides is golden brown.
Mix all the sauce ingredients and set aside.
Time to build this bad boy! Spread burger sauce on a bun, sprinkle diced onion, shredded lettuce, place the patty with cheese, place another slice of bun.
Then more sauce, more onion, shredded lettuce, gherkin slices, another patty, and the last slice of bun!
Dig in and get lovin’ it!
Nutrition  Calories: 1774 Fat: 131 grams  Carbs: 69 grams Fiber:  7 grams  Sugars: 17 grams  Protein: 74 grams
Enjoy!

name: Homemade Big Massive Burger

compilations.description: Who doesn't like a quick and easy breakfast that will instantly fill you up? From some versatile banana pancakes to cheesy egg toast, these recipes will keep you satisfied for rest of the day. Open up our treasure trove of recipes and never step out of the house hungry again.
compilations.name: Super Quick Breakfasts That Every Millennial Should Know

compilations.description: You can never go wrong with avocado, and these easy mouthwatering recipes can enjoyed at any time of the day. Start your day with a wholesome Raddish Avocado Toast or enjoy a Salmon Crab Seafood Stack on a lunch date with your special someone. But why settle for one when you have 31 options to try from? Avo-fun for the whole month!
compilations.name: 31 Days 31 Avocado Recipes

compilations.description: These recipes make a foodie wanna write. Reminisce for all your appetite. Pepperoni Pizza Pockets to help you unwind. BBQ Chicken Poppers to give you peace of mind.
compilations.name: Fast Recipes for Fast Kendrick Verses

description: This quick and easy tomato avocado melt is perfect for a satisfying and healthy lunch or snack, with its gooey cheese and ripe tomatoes that pair perfectly with creamy avocado.

instructions.display_text: Slice avocado.
Slice tomato.
Split english muffin and place the halves face up on a baking sheet.
Cover with avocado, tomato, and top with two slices of Mozzarella cheese. Season with cayenne pepper, to taste.
Broil until cheese is melted and starts to brown. Season each melt with salt and pepper to taste.
Enjoy!

name: Quick And Easy Tomato Avocado Melt

components.raw_text: Season with salt, pepper, and/or cayenne pepper to taste.

compilations.description: This selection of 52 (!!) kid-friendly recipes is a lifesaver for all parents. You’ll find easy after-school snacks like pizza chips, healthy but delicious breakfasts like these PB&J overnight oats, along with plenty of fun recipes to make with your kids for brunch or as a weekend activity. And fair warning: lots of these will be a big hit with the grownups, too!
compilations.name: 52 Kid-Friendly Recipes
Recipes To Make With Your New College Roomie

compilations.description: To all the cookies 'n' cream lovers out there, this is your paradise! Welcome to our creamy and delicious dessert tour, with Tasty's most sought after cookies 'n' cream recipes. Cheesecakes, Sandwiches, Eggnog, Truffles, Doughnuts, even classic Homemade Oreos, we've got it all! You can select from an easy and quick 3-ingredient pie or spend an entire day baking an epic vertical cake. So, shall we begin?
compilations.name: Ultimate Cookies 'N' Cream Marathon!

compilations.description: Feeling lazy? Need recipes you can quickly make? These are the perfect dishes for you! Open up our treasure-trove of recipes and never be sleep hungry again. From versatile freezer foods to two-ingredient recipes, these ideas will delight everyone's taste buds and keep you craving even more.
compilations.name: Food To Eat When You're Feeling Lazy

compilations.description: Mug cooking is one of the greatest boons of our existence. You can snap up a quick, yet delicious, meal all in one dish. This rigatoni looks fancy AF, but comes out of a mug. Have frequent midnight cravings? Bookmark this pizza in a mug or check out these different flavored mug cakes. For busy mornings, we recommend this blueberry french toast in a mug. Get your mugs ready already!
compilations.name: Everything You Can Cook In A Mug

description: It’s 10 p.m. and your dessert craving just hit hard. You want something more elevated than store-bought chocolate chip cookies, but you don’t feel like starting a serious baking endeavor just for yourself. That’s why mug cakes are a total godsend. This cookies and cream version is made with just a handful of basic ingredients. Mix everything into a mug and cook it in the microwave for two minutes. Voilà: A single-serve dessert that’ll satisfy your sweet tooth.

instructions.display_text: In a 12-ounce (375 ml) mug or larger, mix all ingredients until just combined.
Microwave on high for 90 seconds to 2 minutes, watching to make sure it doesn’t spill over (depending on the size of the mug).
Let cool one minute before eating. Top with icing and cookie crumbs (optional).
Enjoy!

name: Cookies & Cream Mug Cake

compilations.description: There is nothing more classic, quintessential yet, or versatile than a sandwich. So we decided to give you 69 of them. The Chicken Bacon Ranch Sandwich Roll is perfect for a summer picnic. The Cuban from Miami never disappoints. For something out-of-the-box, we recommend our loaded Thanksgiving Dip Sandwich (we promise it tastes good all year around). And if you're on the vegan train, go for our tempeh bacon sandwich. Go get that bread already!
compilations.name: 69 Sandwiches From Tasty

compilations.description: If you're trying to eat more keto-friendly recipes, we've got you covered. These low-carb, high fat and protein breakfasts are a great way to kickstart your day. And we're huge fans of the combination of cream cheese and eggs in our easy-to-make cloud bread. Plus, our keto sandwich is so seriously filling, you won't miss the carbs. Finally, our keto caprese avocado bowl packs so much flavor. Eating keto has never tasted so good!
compilations.name: Keto Breakfasts For A Healthy You

description: Skip the drive-thru line and kickstart your day with these quick and easy keto breakfast sandwiches. All you need are six ingredients to recreate the breakfast flavor combo you crave. This morning meal works great for on-the-go or gluten-free eaters, too!

instructions.display_text: In a liquid measuring cup, lightly beat the eggs.

Grease a 10-inch (23 cm) pan with nonstick spray. Place 2 mason jar lids in the pan and heat over medium heat. Add ¼ of the beaten eggs to each lid and season each with ¼ teaspoon salt and ⅛ teaspoon pepper. Cover the pan with a lid and cook for 3–4 minutes, until the eggs are fluffy and set. Repeat with the remaining eggs, salt, and pepper.
Add the sausage patties to the pan and cook over medium heat for 1-2 minutes, flipping once, until browned and warmed through.
Trim the cheddar cheese slices to fit the size of the mason jar lid.
To assemble the sandwiches, stack the sausage and cheddar on 2 of the egg rounds. Top with the other egg rounds.
Serve warm.
Enjoy!

keywords: 20 minute meals, easy and quick breakfast, egg recipes, healthy food, keto breakfast sandwich, keto ideas, keto recipes, low carb breakfast, meal prep ideas, tastysinglerecipe, unique breakfast sandwiches
name: Keto Breakfast Sandwiches

compilations.name: 9 Easy Recipes to Pack for a Picnic
7 Easy-To-Pack Snacks For Your Next Road Trip
11 Fun Recipes For Your Next Girl's Night In

compilations.description: On-the-go snacks don't have to be boring thanks to a fabulous invention called the 'rollup.' From the sweet Strawberry Cream Cheese Roll to our multifaceted Sandwich Roll-Ups, these flavors will explode in your mouth. And if you really want to switch it out, try out our Cheesesteak Roll-Up (yes, you read that right). Now, you never have to choose between sweet and savory again!
compilations.name: Sweet Vs Savory Roll-ups

compilations.description: Rolls are one of our favorite, comforting meals. Our cheesy, loaded bacon-wrapped burger rolls will prove that not all burgers require buns. And these stuffed cabbage rolls are the ideal combination of nutritious and delicious. Of course, we can't forget these classic and hearty spinach and artichoke stuffed chicken rolls. In any case, it's time to roll.
compilations.name: This Is How To 'Roll' With These Recipes

compilations.description: What's more comforting than a hearty, ooey, gooey grilled cheese? We'll tell you: nothing. But sometimes you need to mix it up and, well, that's where we come in: Whether you're taking our crunchy grilled cheese roll-ups to your next picnic or amping it up with our grilled cheese sloppy joe cups, we bet this cheesy wonderland is going to satiate all your cheese-filled desires. Actually, we parm-ise it. Get it? Good. Let's get pressing!
compilations.name: Grilled Cheese Recipes With A Twist
compilations.thumbnail_alt_text: Grilled Cheese Recipes With A Twist

compilations.description: Clean out your cheese drawer with these specially curated cheese recipes. From comfort foods to fine dining dishes, we’ve got it all! Start out your meal with these perfect appetizer: 3-Cheese Garlic Bread Take it further with delicious Stuffed Chicken Parmesan and on a sweet note with the Cream Cheese-Filled Banana Bread Muffins. Gear up for the ultimate cheese marathon.
compilations.name: Just Take It Cheesy!

compilations.description: Time to rock out with some of the tastiest food you can eat with one hand. Need a jumpstart to your day? Whip up some quick and easy Grilled Cheese Roll-Ups! For the garlic bread lover, the Pull-Apart Garlic Rolls are a must-try, while the Steak Fajita Rolls are every meat lover's paradise. Take a bite out of decadent Strawberry Cheesecake Crescent Rolls for a sweet and satisfying end to your day!
compilations.name: Rock 'n' Rolls

compilations.description: Grilled cheese is the ultimate comfort food, isn’t it? There's nothing like a good grilled cheese to cheer up your mood! But why have an ordinary grilled cheese sandwich when you can switch it up a little? Here are some of our favorite grilled cheese recipes that elevate the dish from satisfying to extraordinary. Try our Grilled Cheese Sloppy Joe Cups, for a fun two-bite snack. The Ultimate Grilled Cheese and Tomato Soup Bowl is MUST on a chilly day, or if you want to make sure you get your veggies in, try our Cauliflower Grilled Cheese!
compilations.name: 5 Creative Ways To Elevate Grilled Cheese!

description: This fun and playful take on classic grilled cheese is perfect for kids and adults alike. With a crispy and buttery exterior and melty cheese on the inside, these roll-ups are perfect for dipping in your favorite soup or tomato sauce.

instructions.display_text: Cut crust off the slices of bread. This makes the bread easier to roll and will hold the shape better.
Flatten slices of bread with a rolling pin.
Layer the slices of cheese on top of each slice of bread so that the cheese is offset from the bread by about 1 inch (2 ½ cm) vertically. Other fillings can be added here if desired.
Roll each slice of bread with cheese vertically as tightly as possible without cracking the bread. Gently squeeze each roll to maintain its shape and set down on its seam.
Melt the butter in a pan. Grill each roll starting with the  seam side down on the hot pan.
Rotate so that all sides are evenly golden brown.
Enjoy!

keywords: cheese, dippers, grilled cheese, kids, lunch, roll-ups, rolls, sandwich, tasty, tasty junior, tasty_vegetarian, tomato soup
name: Grilled Cheese Roll-ups

compilations.name: 8 Super Easy Appetizers That Are Healthy And Delicious
Every Easy Avocado Toast Recipe You Should Know

compilations.description: Looking for a fresh start in 2021? We've got just the perfect recommendation to kickstart the new year! From french toasts, pancakes, cobblers, smoothies, avocado toasts, waffles and even this epic mini donut cereal bowl, here's an assortment of our top breakfast recipes. Cheers to a Tasty New Year!
compilations.name: Top Breakfasts of 2020!

compilations.description: We’ve got the easiest and fastest meal plan for an entire week. Not sold yet? Each meal only needs 4 ingredients. Kickstart your Monday with our Avocado Peach and Feta Toast and round out your weekend with a classic comfort food: a Bean and Cheese Burrito. Cooking doesn't have to be hard or intimidating: in fact, it's a 4-step process of fun!
compilations.name: 4 Ingredient Recipes For An Entire Week

compilations.description: Whether you're here for sweet or savory indulgences, we’ve got your back. Take your pick, from an impressive sweet Almond Butter Strawberry Honey And Mint-Stuffed Avocado to a classic and elegant Southwestern Omelette. There's no need to discriminate between your favorite flavors: you can have 'em all. Because you deserve it.
compilations.name: Sweet Vs Savory Avocado Recipes

compilations.description: If there were an Olympics for snacking, we'd win gold. So we're here to encourage all your snacking fantasies. Whether you're team sweet or spicy, we've got the snacks for you. From creamy blueberry ice cream to spicy Southern hot corn, we've got all the sweet and spicy snacks you could ever need.
compilations.name: Extreme Challenge: Sweet Vs Spicy Snacks

compilations.description: Do you have a sweet tooth or are you more spice inclined? These recipes will have you covered no matter what your taste buds demand. Our egg sriracha avocado toast is bound to wake you right up while our chocolate avocado smoothie is good for your gut and your cravings. Our birthday dip cake is a great way to increase your mid-day energy level. And we guarantee you'll basically inhale our protein-packed, cayenne pepper roasted chickpeas. So what's your snacking style?
compilations.name: Extreme Challenge: Sweet Vs Spicy Meals

description: This dish puts a new spin on classic avocado toast by adding a fried egg and spicy Sriracha sauce. It's flavorful and satisfying!

instructions.display_text: Mash half of an avocado. Add salt and pepper, to taste. Mix until well combined.
Spread the mashed avocado evenly across toast.
Top with the fried egg, and drizzle with Sriracha.
Enjoy!

keywords: 9 ways, avocado, blta, bread, breakfast, goodful, peach, snack, toast
name: Spicy Fried Egg Avocado Toast
